alert.note: Alert for Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 12:01AM MDT until August 05 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 1201 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Lindon, or 31 miles northwest of Flagler, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Thurman and Anton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
